args.question: The question to ask. One player will answer at a time
correct_answers: A list of correct answers the player should give. Each answer
that the player correctly gives, will subtract `score_subtraction`
points from the opponent. You ask as many of these questions untill
one player his/her score runs out.
args.score_subtraction: The number of points to subtract from the opponent with each correct answer
args.max_points: number: points to give to the first judge to mark an answer as given. This is also the penalty for wrongly marking an answer as given!
args.min_points: number: points to give to the last judge to mark an answer as given
